<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/build"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a websocket to start a build job. 
More information about the Websocket can be found [here](/docs/Components/Iglu%20Builder#Websocket)

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
